metadata.task-description: Runs the "check" script in order to check if the file names have less than 60 characters. If so, these files are renamed to meet this size. This must be done because file names longer than 60 characters are not accepted by CodeML.
Runs the compi pipeline defined in the "pipeline-single-file.xml" file for each FASTA in the input directory.
Collects the short lists produced by FUBAR and CodeML into the "shorst_list" file, which contains the files with evidences of positive selection.
